where we prioritize security at every single stage of the life cycle so as early as possible we check for security
issues and fix them as early as possible when it is the cheapest so just like with regular software development when a
bug is discovered at a late phase of the life cycle that's when it's the most
expensive to fix compared to if it was immediately discovered and fixed early
on so the first phase actually begins even before a software development

software developers should be trained on application security product owner should be aware of security from their
